html:
4.28.21  4:12 pm   do you think it's ok for people to love whoever they want? more specifically do you think it's ok if i love whoever i want?

      yes, unless that person has been found guilty in the court of public opinion and banished from polite society

4.28.21  2:08 pm   what was happening between might quit and here comes the sun?

      first i recorded the "i'm a princess" song, then i started learning how to make videos, while trying to make the video for "i'm a princess". then i just continued learning how to make videos without working on the "i'm a princess" video. then, finally, after a long time of learning how to make videos but still not really knowing how, i recorded "here comes the sun" and made a video for that

4.28.21  12:14 pm   have you written a song in a language other than english?

      no but that seems like a good idea

4.28.21  11:42 am   Would life be better if English was phonetically consistent?

      no

4.28.21  11:37 am   what are your thoughts on this "when you're happy you enjoy the music, when you're sad you understand the lyrics" idea?

      that sounds true

4.28.21  8:59 am   What song/music video so far are you most proud of?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.28.21  7:47 am   can you change the background of the lyrics page to something else? my eyes hurt trying to read the lyrics.

      that is a gentle reminder that the lyrics belong in the songs, not sitting silently on a page

4.28.21  7:33 am   What do you do when you're sad?

      turn it into a folk tale

4.28.21  2:03 am   How many holes does a straw have

      too many to count

4.28.21  12:51 am   i'm pretty much a beginner when it comes to writing music. i don't know a lot about music theory or anything, i just really love music. after listening to you, jacob collier and other musicians that i admire, i find myself wanting to create something unique too, but every time i try to write what sounds and feels good, i feel like i end up with a generic chord progression or a simple melody. sure, less can be more, but do you think it's worth it if it stops being unique?

      it might be time to try something a little more ...... mischievous. Here's a nice exercise to try: pretend you are in a songwriting contest, and try to write something that would guarantee you'd get last place

4.28.21  12:31 am   if you could choose a month to celebrate a new year (disregarding when the earth finishes a revolution or the fact that different parts of the world experience different seasons), which month would you choose?

     if i'm celebrating a year, then i think it would be best to celebrate it for a year (not a month)

     personally, i sort of hate the fact that the new year starts 1/3 of the way into winter for where i live. do you think that celebrating a new year amid the austerity of winter contributes to some people giving up on their goals for the new year?

     i think the fact that 'new years' is known as 1 day, and not a year, is the reason people's 'new years' goals don't last much longer than a day

     do the seasons affect your motivation/mood?

     the best part is when they change. which fortunately is always

      and do you find it helpful to observe days that signify change (new years, birthdays, etc) to make changes in your own life?

     i prefer to observe the change when the actual life changes happen. which is not always easy to predict

4.27.21  11:21 pm   Hi!! First off, I want to say that I am consistently in awe of your music and I love how your videos complement the songs so well (and so artistically). You're one of my favorite artists of all time and I rank you up at the top in my list of favorites, along with the Beatles, Steely Dan, and the Beach Boys. I'm also grateful that you offer a place to share your knowledge and humor with your fans - it's a very unique opportunity to talk directly with someone who inspires you.

     holy smokes you are very friendly

     okay enough yammering here's my question:
When writing your songs, are you usually putting words to music or putting music to words? I ask because I see you also used to do instrumentals. I'm woefully bad at lyrics, and a lot of the time I'm not even compelled to write them, because I stubbornly believe maybe the music I create will convey the emotions I'm trying to express on its own. Do you make your music with an emotion/other goal in mind and then write lyrics to m atch it, or do you write your lyrics and then write music to match? If you do both, have you found that your final products tend to be different depending on your method, and in what way(s)?

     for best results, i have to come up with the words and music at the same time. they rely on each other so much, i'm almost asking for trouble if i try to do it separately

     Thanks in advance so much for answering!

4.27.21  10:20 pm   do you/did you used to make short videos to take breaks from long term projects? "what is love", "ball and stick" etc...

      no

4.27.21  10:12 pm   What letter do you find yourself using the most when doing things?

      e

4.27.21  9:55 pm   If you had a talk show how would be called and who would be your first guess?

      i don't know

4.27.21  8:47 pm   is your next song going to have a calm, soothing vibe, like a lullaby or the sound of nature?

      if there was a groovy version of nature

4.27.21  8:30 pm   What is gravity?

      you

4.27.21  5:09 pm   Sometimes from 2017 - 2019, you announce your new videos on twitter, why don't you do that again?

      i guess promotional links are not something that feels like particularly good twitter content, to me

4.27.21  4:54 pm   how long does it take you to write a song/ finish the video?

      a very sensible amount of time

4.27.21  4:33 pm   do you ever find it hard not to reuse chords or progressions?

      it's ok to re-use chords and chord sequences. But, in case i'm ever in a situation where i should not, i usually don't have too much trouble switching it

4.27.21  4:08 pm   what was the bad thing you did in "just did a bad thing"

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

4.27.21  3:56 pm   Do you make love with Mona Lisa?

      not all the time

4.27.21  3:49 pm   What is science?

      could be some type of art

4.27.21  3:12 pm   what is the reasoning for your high amount of words in you songs

      with more words i can justify using more notes

4.27.21  2:47 pm   How do you translate the rythms you have in your head to music notation?

      it's the same way you just translated your question into words, into letters, and then typed them on the keyboard. there's this magic department of our brains that does that stuff without even realizing we are doing it. i think it's the Language department

4.27.21  2:07 pm   How do you make a good sounding chord progression with a basic to no understanding of piano?

      having some words and ideas will definitely help to propel things to some purposeful places. might be good to have this regardless of your experience level with chords. or perhaps you could use pictures to inspire you .... or memories, of certain scenarios

4.27.21  2:03 pm   what do I do if life is always overwhelmingly bad and everything goes wrong all the time? 

      write it up

4.27.21  1:45 pm   thoughts on the fabric of reality

      it's pretty dazzling i must say

4.27.21  1:28 pm   10.20.15  7:22 pm , 9.26.15  7:14 pm : were those taken from your notes, or did they just happen to be similar to just did a bad thing and history of the entire world i guess?

      those are taken from my general viewpoints, and/or linguistic repertoire

4.27.21  1:23 pm   How do I start writing music if I am talentless?

      by surprise

4.27.21  1:17 pm   Hey bill, what cords did you use in your latest song at "a billion" I apologize for asking, I have untuned ears.

      that whole section should easily fall into place with something along the lines of F#maj9, C#9sus4

4.27.21  12:33 pm   Are the notes in your notebook things that you actually wrote on a pencil and paper notebook?

      no, i wrote them in text

4.27.21  12:22 pm   does the "better things" text in i'm a princess mean that the rest of the video is in the newer, "better" software? (also that riff is super catchy and i love it)

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.27.21  12:19 pm   How do you lose at spelling?

      the other person does not get what you're trying to say to them

4.27.21  10:37 am   hey bill, this might be stupid but every time I try to write something new it always ends up sounding too similar to my previous stuff. how do u do it?

      sometimes you can temporarily suspend the requirement that it's supposed to be 'any good'

4.27.21  10:35 am   why are the words in this site spelled wrong sometimes?

      either for artistic reasons or by mistake. if you give a specific example i can probably figure out which it was

4.27.21  10:20 am   bill, i have an idea i am too lazy to properly execute. how should one develop a habit of doing one's ideas instead of procrastinating?

      i guess it depends on how much you want them to be done

4.27.21  8:44 am   I'm very impatient when it comes to making music. I know barely anything about music theory and I don't have any ideas or anything, so all my music feels shallow and like it doesn't have any meaning. I love making music, but I hate the music I make. I know I should just learn music theory and that'll at least help some, but I'm so impatient that i keep making music knowing fully well that i'll hate it and just hate myself even more aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa what do I do

      you may have already thought of this, but, you're going to have to calm down

4.27.21  6:52 am   will you make another video like the starbucks thing, without voice and just jazz? 

      there's a whole section of my website for those. they're not videos, but then again neither is the 'starbucks' one, mostly

4.27.21  5:37 am   Hi Bill, do you create and publish songs for the purpose of creating revenue, or for other's entertainment? (Or maybe a little bit of both?)

      i'm trying to prove to myself that it can be done how i think it can be done. and then in case i succeed, it would prove that to someone else in the process. in a similar way that someone could have proved it to me before

4.27.21  3:09 am   i enjoy making music, but i find the music i like to make is often unfriendly, and would not be a nice place to go, even if it's interesting. do you think music, or art in general, should strive to be pleasant and personable?

      if you can't do that right now, sometimes you gotta just be truthful. it will become friendly eventually. science guarantees this

4.27.21  1:37 am   Have you ever seen a penguin?

      i thought i had but now that i think back there's a whole host of other things it could have been

4.27.21  12:23 am   why does Wednesday seem so long ago?

      it might be Tuesday

4.26.21  11:09 pm   what is stopping me?

      too many ways to go. you haven't decided yet

4.26.21  8:46 pm   I don't know a lot about keyboards except the names of the notes. I was thinking of taking your advice and learning short songs first- and you have 1 chord songs like "no/yes/die". Should I start there?

      sure. i admit that's probably pretty convenient for learning what you're learning

4.26.21  7:30 pm   how to lessen my perfectionism, i feel the need to make everything perfect for no reason, even things that don't matter and it stops me from getting things done when I could be using the time doing other more useful things

      hopefully you will realize that it never gets perfect no matter how much you try. so hopefully that will give you some peace of mind

4.26.21  5:40 pm   How do you feel about spelling monkey as monke?

      i'll admit it's possible

4.26.21  5:32 am   is damien maymdien an acronym? like "name id" or something

      no. its value is more in the phonetics

4.26.21  5:25 pm   have you ever been betrayed, abandoned or otherwise made an incoherent fool out of?

      that sounds like something i would do

4.26.21  4:47 pm   Where does ideas come from? 

      you
